attributes.action: Do not issue any commemorative coin when the UK leaves the EU.
attributes.background: It is reported that the Chancellor will authorise the striking of a commemorative 50p coin to mark the departure of the UK from the EU.

rejection.details:
Coins are manufactured and issued by the Royal Mint, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can find out more here: https://www.royalmint.com/discover/uk-coins/coin-design-and-specifications/.
